content.rendered:
About me

Scott has over twenty years’ commercial and academic experience in the English as a Foreign Language and corporate communications skills sectors. During his career, his job roles have included corporate trainer, Academic Manager, Principal for his own school teaching London-based Japanese expatriates, and international Business Development Manager recruiting B2B and B2C in the HE and corporate sectors. During his commercial career, he has worked in international markets as diverse as East, West, Central and Northern Europe, as well as Eurasia and South East Asia. This has given him a truly global outlook and deep insight into­­­ international clients’ pedagogical, intercultural and vocational needs.

Key responsibilities

Scott is responsible for managing ClickEnglish, which comprises both Regent’s online English language testing system and its delivery of real time and self-study EAP and ESP courses both on campus and overseas, in country.
